name: ServiceWorkerContainer.startMessages
description: The startMessages() method of the ServiceWorkerContainer interface explicitly starts the flow of messages being dispatched from a service worker to pages under its control (e.g. sent via Client.postMessage()). This can be used to react to sent messages earlier, even before that page's content has finished loading.

refs.name: Service Workers
refs.description: The definition of 'ServiceWorkerContainer: startMessages()' in the 'Service Workers' specification.
